text:
This is 100x better than ChatGPT (and free).

How to create your own chatbot:

✦ 1. Find a topic expert on what you need to know.
✦ 2. Go to NotebookLM and create a new notebook.
✦ 3. Feed it (a lot of) PDFs, YouTube links, websites.

Now you can either (1) chat with it like ChatGPT, or (2) create a mindmap, or (3) join a podcast.

About (3), I couldn't believe it either.

Read my free step-by-step guide on howtoai.guide or by clicking: https://lnkd.in/dpAVAZSs.
